data.title: No Friend of Mine
data.description: Probably the first song I have ever written. The great Henry Hudson III was a friend of a friend and did the sax solo for me. This was the first take, for which I have never forgiven him. My great friends G-Jo & Michelle did the background vocals.

data.title: Psychosomatic Blues
data.description: A great tune by my brother, Howard. Sugarchuck kills it on slide.

data.title: No Foolin'
data.description: The changes of this song are a gateway drug to jazz; the lyrics are a mash up of two poems I'd written. The guitar solo is pretty good for me.

data.title: All of Me
data.description: Fell in love with this tune. These changes were jazz crack to a young jk

data.title: Napoleonne
data.description: Another great Howard Kranz tune. We loved playing it so much we couldn't stop rehearsing. Everybody fell in love with it.

data.title: Direction
data.description: Of course I stole teh line from Dylan. It needed its own tune.
